title: Hustlers
overview: Hustlers chronicles the journey of Sanjay Sharma as he chases his ultimate dream of 'Naam Kamana Hai' so that he can prove his worth to his family, specifically his father. When the real world throws its harsh realities at Sanjay, he finds quirky ways to fight them and twist the situation in his favor. But how far is he willing to go to make his dreams come true?
